reviewText: bought it because i saw the series on TV. wouldn't have bought it if i didn't like it. This depicts a part of Bible history which has often been hidden and is relatively unknown. I find that interesting
Enjoyable. Could have been more in-depth though.

This, like the first, part explores a lot of the books left out the final cut of the bible and does so in an interesting way.
I wish more people would watch this.
My father loved these DVDs. For anyone who wants to dive deeper into their Christian faith this is a good gift.

The facts were interesting presented.  It connected comments made in the Bible to material contained in manuscripts not contained in the Bible.  Obviously people in that period had access to these materials.  It broadens our understanding of the manuscripts that were available.
had a lot of facts I never knew. Was very interesting. Worth it to watch.
What else were we deprived of in the name of the church & the powers that be! Really makes you question the acuraccy of the bible
